*div1 type="summary"* *p*Littleberry Hawkins to Austin, August 6,1826. Concerning his and Mrs. J. H. Hawkins's claims. Active emigration from Kentucky to Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Lexington */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="08-06-1826">August 6. 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin Esqr*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr Sir*/p* *p*I have so repeatedly written you and have never received aline from you, that I have frequently almost determined to decline the matter I am still using great industry in geting up *person_mentioned*Company */person_mentioned*to visit your *location_mentioned*grant */location_mentioned*and have left nothing undone on my part since the death of my *location_mentioned*Brother */location_mentioned*I have been a perfect *person_mentioned*slave */person_mentioned*and have great difficulty in Keeping the two *person_mentioned*families */person_mentioned*from actual want they ware left without One Dollar I have gotten *person_mentioned*George the Eldest son of my Brother*/person_mentioned* in the *person_mentioned*Navy */person_mentioned*and he is ordered into the service I inclosed to you my two *location_mentioned*Grants */location_mentioned*of land By *person_mentioned*J E B Austin*/person_mentioned* do the best you can with them for me hand the letters inclosed and say what is necessary, from the intimacy and friendship between the *person_mentioned*families */person_mentioned*I had hoped to been by you advised etc as to the interest we had taken in the *location_mentioned*Grant */location_mentioned*you are labouring under fals impressions as to *person_mentioned*Botts */person_mentioned*and my self On *date_mentioned n="08/28/1826">Next monday*/date_mentioned* there is to be a large meeting of *person_mentioned*Citizens*/person_mentioned* at *location_mentioned*Versailles Woodford County*/location_mentioned* on the subject of going to your *location_mentioned*settlement */location_mentioned*I find it stands higher than any other grant the colonel is about starting please [write] me and *person_mentioned*Mrs. J. H. Hawkin*/person_mentioned*s when you find it Convenient so soon as I can place the *person_mentioned*families */person_mentioned*in that situation that will Keep them from actual want It is my intention to come to the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*Change if necessary my two *location_mentioned*grants */location_mentioned*and have them located where you think best particularly the One on *location_mentioned*Guadeloupe */location_mentioned*if best so to do the reports as to the inundation of the lands on *location_mentioned*Brassos */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*Colorado Rivers*/location_mentioned* is unfavourable and I am disprising (?) those impressions believing they are not true*/p*
*p*god bless you and your friends*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*L Hawkins*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Please speak of me to your *person_mentioned*Brother */person_mentioned*I would give all I possess to have two hours conversation with you*/p*
*/div1*
